nodes.text: "Smuggler's Run, Part 3" (German: "Im Auftrag der Rebellion, Teil 3") is a canon comic story written by Alec Worley, illustrated by Ingo Römling, and based on the novel of the same name by Greg Rucka. It was first published by Panini Verlag in the magazine Star Wars Universe 3 on February 28, 2018.
An English-language version was later collected in Star Wars Adventures: Smuggler's Run 2.
